TopicTitle: 100% stock Refulling tanker by Capt Snuggler *On Spaceport*

Articles.Content:
*NOW ON SPACEPORT*

Hi all,

A very talented friend of mine, Capt Snuggler has created this work of art to refuel his new SSTO, "Stingray".

It is a fully functional refueling truck which can detach from the Fuel tank payload.

Seats two, carries one orange tank and a rear docking port for fuel transfer.

This thing even twists at the attachment point of the fuel load. Meaning you have to drive it like the real thing!

Here she is:

Separated from fuel load:

Thirsty girl!

MJ

Edited October 10, 2013 by Majorjim
Any chance we will get a craft file for download of this amazing truck?

Any chance we will get a craft file for download of this amazing truck?

Err, yeah I will upload it shortly.

MJ

Is it stock?

Yup, this is stock.
This is definitely a fine piece of engineering, but shouldn't this be in The Spacecraft Exchange section, not General Discussion?

This is definitely a fine piece of engineering, but shouldn't this be in The Spacecraft Exchange section, not General Discussion?

At the time of posting I wasn't sure about posting the craft file. When its on Spaceport I will open a thread in the SCE.

MJ
Impressive, does the junior docking port work well as an rotating join?

Impressive, does the junior docking port work well as an rotating join?

On its own, it doesn't flex much. by adding an I beam to one of them it flexes quite nicely.
My compliments to your friend and his truck-building, and my thanks to you for posting this.
this looks awesome! can you please post in here when you have the .craft file on spaceport?

this looks awesome! can you please post in here when you have the .craft file on spaceport?

Yup, as soon as Its up there I will post a link here.

Hi all! Snuggler here, thank you all for your kind words. sorry for the delay, we will post the craft file asap but there is still a little "fine tuning" to be done. watch this space.

cheers,

-Snug
